alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 27 at 1:35PM PST until December 28 at 3:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Expect damage to trees and power lines as well. Total wet snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches are expected. Areas of winds west 30 to 40 mph with local gusts to 65 mph. * WHERE...San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 3 AM Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The more significant snow accumulations will be above 5000 to 5500 feet. The stronger winds will be near the mountain ridge tops and along the desert slopes of the mountains. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning for wet snow means severe winter weather conditions are occurring. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
